website_summaries.verdict: A sleek, 11.5-ounce capacity automatic soap dispenser that is powered by 4 AAA batteries.
pros: This model has a large, medium, and small dispenser setting, so you get just the right amount of soap each time
It is designed with a silicone outlet to ensure no leakage between uses, and the reservoir has a large opening to facilitate refills
cons: Occasionally, there is a unit that has an issue with the sensor, but the company stands behind its product with a 90-day, 100% satisfaction guarantee

customer_reviews.title: well designed
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the Simply Human model I previously used, this one is better designed. It's easy to install the batteries and the outside is sleek. Even the LED is a stylish bar instead of a little LED dot. It initially didn't work but after I took the soap reservoir off and dunked the tube end into a sink full of water and activated it a few times it started squirting out water like it should. After that it worked with the soap too.
customer_reviews.author: Joe the Prof

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect
customer_reviews.text: You can set it to dispense the amount of soap you want! It looks great & works perfectly every time!
customer_reviews.author: R. Gaffney

customer_reviews.title: Hidden features!
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this product hides the adjustments for the amount being dispensed. My family thinks you need a handful to wash with. This has definitely saved us on excessive soap usage. The sensor is not as sensitive as some, but that is not always a bad thing. I do have to try twice sometimes to get it to work, but I don’t have issues with accidental dispensing. Overall, I am very pleased with this product and would purchase again. Update: The dispenser worker great for about 6 months, then died.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Thompson-Whitt

customer_reviews.title: Great dispenser for kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Great dispenser for kitchen. Easy to setup and control dispensing volume.
customer_reviews.author: RLY

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE- RUN
customer_reviews.text: "RUN" Do not purchase this item. The suction does not work. It has taken over 3 weeks to receive a return label from seller and I'm responsible for postage. They wanted me to record a video and show them how their damaged dispenser didn't work and try to put hot water into the dispenser to see if that works. Im NOT on their payroll and can't understand why I'm doing quality control on an item that should have never been placed on the shelf if a consumer has to do all that. DO NOT PURCHASE, RUN FORREST, RUN!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shera james

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 2 of these devices in the past and have been pleased, but the latest one didn't sense (no light came on, no matter how many times I pushed the little button) and didn't pump. Of course, you only learn this after putting in 4 batteries (yes, they're fresh batteries and yes, they were put in, in the right direction) and filling the unit with soap. At that point it's hard to return.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: These do not work and they want ME to pay to return them to China!
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy another product from China. I expect to be able to return a product if it doesn't work. I have purchased 100's of items from Amazon. The shipping would cost more than I paid for the item. This is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Kind of tall, but works really great
customer_reviews.text: Tried a different touchless soap dispensers. The variable dispensing settings are great if you want just a little soap or a lot. The batteries are tucked inside the unit, so you don't have to worry about the electronic parts getting wet and rusty like most other touchless soap dispensers. Conclusion - if you don't mind a slightly bigger profile dispenser, this one is great and will likely last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great motion detection
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a few of these for the office. The motion detection is perfect. We use it with hand sanitizer, but the gel we had needed to be thinned out considerably with isopropyl alcohol before it was able to work. The seller gave me that tip. They got back to me right away after I contacted them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. The first one lasted just over a year before the motor stopped working. Supplier said the warranty is one year. I ordered a second one while the first was still working and that one did not work out of the box, so I returned it. I think the product is unreliable and not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Run4fun

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 7 months and it stopped working. I also didn’t like that every time you needed soap you had to put the sponge underneath 3 or 4 times for it to dispense the soap. This would happen only after a few hours of not using it. Very inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what is advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I love how the batteries are located at the top and not the bottom. I love the 3 options for soap dispenser. I hope to see this model last longer than my previous one (different brand/style). This is being used in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I first bought it in December of 2019. It has stopped working after 6 months of normal use. We changed batteries and cleared the tube to make sure that was not the issue. The green light for the sensor turns on but the pump that distributes the soap doesn't turn on. Very disappointed in this product. I will be sure to read more reviews next time.
customer_reviews.author: John J Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! Unfortunately I ruined it.. don't put liquid soap in the top! The container is removed for refilling on the bottom! I will buy another. Perfect size for the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: sherry allen

customer_reviews.title: Totally dead right out of box
customer_reviews.text: I tried changing the batteries 3X before giving up. Totally dead. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cuter than practicality
customer_reviews.text: have to replace batteries too much and the sensor isn't strong. the hole where the soap comes out, clogs up quickly if you don't use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Peachesobama

customer_reviews.title: Nice soap dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Nice sport dispenser. It takes a little while to prime the pump to get the liquid soap to come out but once you do that it's great! Works better with lighter complexion people to.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great household addition
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 1 and then bought 2 more. All of our sinks in entire household now has one. We LOVE the ease of using hand soap touch free!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gajeski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought quit a few. This product is the best I’ve ever seen. Works great, easy to maintain, looks nice,very happy with the soap dispenser!,
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: It took a day or so to get this dispenser to work consistently but after that no troubles. LOVE it! Don't know how I lived without it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Windsor

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for The powder room, guest room bathroom, very pleased with it, sleek-looking, dispenses soap nicely, easy to refill.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE DUGGAN

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This stopped working after a few months of VERY light use. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Azile

customer_reviews.title: Great even after months of use
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars, but I've only had it for a short while. Previously, I used a different brand and it was terrible. I'm hoping it continues to work great. .... I've used this for quite some time and it is performing great. I just purchased ANOTHER one . Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January and it worked well until today. It stopped pumping the soap altogether. I changed the batteries, although I didn’t think that was the problem, and I was right. The green light appears when the motion sensor in activated, but nothing comes out. Pretty disappointed after having this for 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Shaponick

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 4 months. Don’t waste your money !
customer_reviews.text: Worked only for 4 months. Changed the battery thinking it died. The top lights up but nothing comes out. I wouldn’t recommend this product/brand. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Anamaria

customer_reviews.title: It may stop working after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: It was working great until I tried refilling the soap reservoir today. The green light will come on and the batteries are new. Seems like the pump stopped working. This is a bummer because I bought it for my AirBnB and the customers loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannen Green

customer_reviews.title: Too bad.
customer_reviews.text: Probably a dud. Design is good with a detachable reservoir. However, the motor worked poorly at the outset and quit completely in 2 weeks. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Thedoc

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed , it has stopped working and I haven’t had it that long . I don’t recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Looked for dispenser that you could adjust flow size and had battery on top. So far this one works great.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Payne

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, bad customer service, device stopped working
customer_reviews.text: We bought several of these and they are not working, the description says they will replace but I have reached out to the seller and have not heard back. I guess this is now money thrown to the trash. I have complained to Amazon and have not heard back either.
customer_reviews.author: goodie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I use it at my kitchen sink since my sink is black. Looks and works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never Worked!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a piece of garbage. The sensor light came on as it was supposed to but the pump never worked. I threw it into the recycling bin and bought the more expensive Simply Human auto pump. Worked right out of the box!! Sam S
customer_reviews.author: Sam Sotiriou

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: For amount spent amazing value and lot of savings on detergent plus good battery life
customer_reviews.author: Nirmala

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: Does not release enough soap even at the max setting. Have to engage it 4 or 5 times get enough soap to begin washing dishes. This was my last attempt at automatic soap dispensers. Back to a manual pump!
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and battery compartment didnt come out than i recieved a second and never pumped out soap.
customer_reviews.author: ambur gale

customer_reviews.title: Newest Soap Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I like the the shape and color. Easy to refill and looks nice on the counter tops.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle M. Gerst

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Junk
customer_reviews.text: This worked ok for about 2 weeks, and now it's junk and won't do anything but light up if activated. Cleaned all the mechanics and put fresh batteries in it. Do NOT buy.
customer_reviews.author: James Heard

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: This product looked very nice, but it did not squirt out enough soap when you placed your hand under it. We also found that if your hand was dirty, it didn't always detect your hand, which kind of defeated the purpose .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for very long
customer_reviews.text: I received this soap dispenser around Christmas and it stopped working after 6 months. The light came on, but the soap did not dispense. I changed the batteries and added different soap, but it didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Justin H.

customer_reviews.title: Motion Detector Faulty
customer_reviews.text: Worked for one day. Hardly detects motion unfortunately. Only a small drop comes out occasionally now. I plan on throwing this one out and buying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3-4 months
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working completely after 3.5 months. It’s really great but will be expensive if you have to buy a new one every season.
customer_reviews.author: CindySW

customer_reviews.title: This product is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 3 months. Selling Company and Amazon would not honor year warranty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!
customer_reviews.text: Yay! It works! Just got it, it was packed well and it works as described. The batteries are located at the top and easy to install. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gillen

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Returned extremely poor quality. Failed out of the box. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uses all kinds of liquid soap
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and works well with any soap without needing to dilute..it is just a bit pricey but all and all worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike c.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. Soap would not pump up the tube... Returned
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Did not dispense soap
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work. Tried different soaps and none would dispense any soap.
customer_reviews.author: jeff storm

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: I loved it but it didn’t last. Was there a warranty?
customer_reviews.author: Errol Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great automatic Soap Dispense
customer_reviews.text: It is a great dispenser for kitchen or bathroom. I love the design. The container is in the bottom and the battery is on top. This helps to prevent water damage to the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Guanxi Xiao

customer_reviews.title: Another one bite's the dust
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for 12 weeks and it will not dispense soap..tried changing batteries, cleaned line and diluted soap but only the green light comes on. The motor will not work. We have bought about 8 different brands of these dispensers in the last 3 years and all of them only last between 2 weeks to 3 months. The only brand that has been reliable that we purchased on Amazon is the the ones we have in our bathrooms so I am going to purchase another one like that brand to use in the kitchen (Me Sugar brand soap dispenser if anyone interested)
customer_reviews.author: Ardis

customer_reviews.title: Seems great so far
customer_reviews.text: I received the SVAVO Automatic Sensor Soap Dispenser in a few days after the order. The set-up was easy, it is solidly made, easy to fill, functions well. No drips, looks clean and sleek. I don't know about battery life or longevity of the product as I've only used it for a couple of weeks. I use it in the kitchen with regular dish soap. It has happened where the IR sensor didn't seem to recognize a plastic bowl underneath and wouldn't dispense. I had to put my hand in place to get it to "fire". I'm pleased, and will get one for the bathroom if it continues to operate well.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after a year!!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product when we first got it, but a few months ago it started to not work, we always changed the batteries when they needed to be change, cleaned the tube in it, but this time nothing worked to try to get it to work. it just stopped. So disappointed, not going to buy another
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Greats functionality! Stopped working after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Tall enough to go above our bowl vanity sink. Hasn’t falsely dispensed soap yet and works better than expected. And the wife likes how it looks and matches our decor. The batteries load on top so no chance to be corroded by sitting in water. You’ll really enjoy having this item in your home! ***update**** After 8 months stopped working. The lights come on and seems to have power but the sensor no longer works the soap is no longer dispensed. Seems like you should get more than 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Hernan C.

customer_reviews.title: Like the bottom container design.  Motion detection is a little less sensitive than others.
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 dispensers previously which all died in less than 6 months. The bottom soap dispenser on this design more reliable than the others. I have to be more careful where I wave my hand than with the previous ones. Unfortunately the unit was dead on arrival, but customer servcice was great, and I received a working replacement in 5 days. So far so good. Only time will tell long-term reliability.
customer_reviews.author: CyberMan

customer_reviews.title: Automatic hand soap dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I had a little trouble with figuring out of tubing was being primed or not. It took many prompts. I did not receive a response from the company before I figured out on my own. The handle listing the battery housing pulled off without lifting the cylinder. I like the design and appearance and allows different amounts of ha swashbuckled limits and the green light is good to let the user know if batteries need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Susie cue

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money, doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Worked for a few weeks and now soap won’t come out. I have tried different hand soaps, but still doesn’t work right. Have tried to water down soap and it still doesn’t work. Of course it’s past the return time so pretty much a waste of money. I would not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ry's mom

customer_reviews.title: great dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest dispenser I've owned. Batteries are easy to access and change. Soap is easy to refill. Only issue I have is, this one sits by our basement bar sink - so it doesn't get used regularly. If the dispenser sits for a day or 2 without use, the soap falls down the line so it takes a few cycles to get it back up to the tip. Still - not a big deal for us - looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Pfeifer

customer_reviews.title: Best yet
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 4 soap dispensers. This is the best one so far. I holds a lot of soap and is easy to fill. The amount of soap dispensed is very liberal and consistent, with no drips. The led ring that lights up while dispensing soap is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Billiardman

customer_reviews.title: Quality 👎👎👎👎👎
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed less the a month an stop working !!!! Don’t by this product !!!! Also they approve the return not free the cost to end it back is $39 😂😂😂 I don’t think so liars !!! After all they send me one !!!!!!!!!! with out returning the other one! 👏👏👏👏👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: gustavo beroocal

customer_reviews.title: Stick with low tech
customer_reviews.text: This is a battery sucking money sponge. It works okay, but you would be better off with a manual device.
customer_reviews.author: DrSkin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap dispenser. I typically have troubles with Dawn soap because it is thicker but that wasn't a problem with this dispenser. I love that you can select the amount you want to dispense. It stays upright very nicely and looks good in my kitchen. My only regret is not ordering it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: M. Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Very responsive and beautiful design.
customer_reviews.text: There isn't anything to dislike about this fine product it it artistically beautiful and totally functional. Behave as described. Great product to replace that ugly, stick soap dispenser plunger bottle.
customer_reviews.author: JesusChrysler

customer_reviews.title: its a great dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I have another brand,, and bought this for another room more to compare, but it works so good,, I almost want to replace the other. This took a bit to prime for the 1st use but really is a nice looking,, and consistent dispensing.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I like the design of the product (looks great on my sink) and that you can control the amount of soap dispensed.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in product
customer_reviews.text: After two months, the soap dispensers stopped working... very frustrating and disappointed in product!!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Newman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Refill & Change Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Love the soap container unscrews from the bottom and batteries are on the top. You don't have to turn it upside down to change out the batteries. It's also not overly sensitive in regards to dispensing soap.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: I love the batteries on top
customer_reviews.text: Putting the batteries on top makes it so much easier to fill the soap part, my older one had the batteries on the bottom which was always a problem. Love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great item ESPECIALLY for the  price!
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser works really well, looks sleek on my kitchen counter, has 3 dispensing levels from less to more. I love it! And, the price was perfect! I definitely recommend purchasing this dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shaving motion soap dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This dies after seven months. Is there a replacement policy or warranty?
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Just got today and it works great. Takes a bunch of times to get the soap primed enough to come through the first time but really liking it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product, lasted less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I was looking for. No issues with the product but lasted less than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: MayoD

customer_reviews.title: Works great with normal dish soap
customer_reviews.text: Works great with normal dish soap, I like that the battery compartment is on the top so there is no worry about water entering
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Dafoe

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive fits my home well modern chic
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive fits my home well modern I will re-order two more for Master bathroom and guest bath . Although I ordered the black for the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Lashandra M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Took me a bit to load the batteries correctly but works like a charm on my kitchen counter!
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Broke-when fell into sink
customer_reviews.text: I loved it for a whole three days! Then, it fell into the sink and completely fell apart. It no longer works and is not fixable. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Jes Michie

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it a few months before it died. I've tried brand new batteries and it still will not work. While it worked, it was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Senando Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Never Worked
customer_reviews.text: Never worked. 1st one that was received didn't work and the replacement didn't work either.
customer_reviews.author: christine milligan

customer_reviews.title: Clean and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this dispenser. It’s great for arthritic hands to ease pumping manually. And the grandkids thinks it’s fun to use...so they wash their hands more. I bought and live two!
customer_reviews.author: Melody Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: With the sleek design it does just what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

product_meta.title: SVAVO Automatic Sensor Soap Dispenser - 11.5OZ Capacity Infrared Motion Sensor Touchless Countertop Soap Dispensers for Smart Home, Dispensary, Clinic, School, Adjustable Soap Dispensing Volume, Black
feature_bullets: ▶ECO FRIENDLY & BPA FREE - The SVAVO hands free soap dispenser is made of ABS, PETG plastic which performs much better than ordinary ABS or PC plastic. With high impact and high mechanical strength, our product is abrasion and moisture resistant. In addition, ABS exhibits high chemical resistance to many acids, alkalis, oils, and salts. Each dispenser is free of BPA, a harmful toxin that can seep into the human body and cause cognitive and developmental issues).

▶WATER RESISTANT - With the battery compartment built into the top of the dispenser, your dispenser is not at risk of being soaked in liquid or moisture. And there’s no need to worry about your favorite kitchen tool being damaged by misuse. Our dispensers are made with premium PP plastic, so you won’t have any leakage or fragile bottle hassles. After installing 4 AAA-size batteries (NOT included), you will enjoy hands-free soap dispensing for up to a year before having to change the batteries.

▶UNIQUE DESIGN -This high-efficiency, touch free dispenser is cost-effective. With no dripping or trailing, you’ll save money on whatever you put inside - soap, sanitizer or lotion. The 3 different liquid volume options allow you to get right soap amount, just press the multifunction button to adjust this setting. Built-in, infrared motion sensors and one-button operation provides you with a touch-less experience. It's also anti-leakage and won’t spillage since it’s made with a silicone outlet.

▶VERSATILE USE - SVAVO automatic soap pump is perfect for both commercial and private use. It's ideal for use in restrooms, bathrooms, kitchens and guest rooms. It performs well with large capacities, too, making it ideal for hospitals, schools, offices, restaurants, hotels, coffee shops and other public places. Help reduce the spread of bacteria and improve public hand hygiene!

▶100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We stand firmly behind our SVAVO dispensers, if you are not totally happy with your liquid soap dispenser, return it, hassle-free, for a full refund or replacement within 90-days. If you have problems with your SVAVO dispenser after 90-days but within 1-year of purchasing it, SVAVO will repair or replace your device. If you do have any issues, please feel free to contact us via Amazon‘s email system. We are always here to provide you with the best customer service!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars197 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
